name: MLWordTagger.ModelParameters.ValidationData
desc: The validation data that a word tagger uses.

items.name: case split(strategy: MLSplitStrategy)
items.desc: Generates the validation data by splitting the training dataset.

items.name: case table(MLDataTable, tokenColumn: String, labelColumn: String)
items.desc: Sets the validation data from the provided data table.

items.name: case tuples([(tokens: [MLWordTagger.Token], labels: [String])])
items.desc: Sets the validation data from a list of tokens and labels.
